mapper.select: SELECT r.review_id, r.content, r.rating, r.created_at, i.title AS item_title, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - r.created_at) AS days_ago FROM Review r JOIN Rental rent ON r.rental_id = rent.rental_id JOIN Item i ON rent.item_id = i.item_id WHERE r.user_target_id = #{user_target_id} ORDER BY r.created_at DESC

SELECT r.review_id, r.content, r.rating, r.created_at, i.title AS item_title, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - r.created_at) AS days_ago FROM Review r JOIN Rental rent ON r.rental_id = rent.rental_id JOIN Item i ON rent.item_id = i.item_id WHERE r.user_write_id = #{user_write_id} ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Review (content, rating, rental_id, user_write_id, user_target_id, created_at) VALUES (#{content}, #{rating}, #{rental_id}, #{user_write_id}, #{user_target_id}, SYSDATE)
